code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Sidebar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=_ref=>{let{activePage='materiel'}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const menuItems=[{icon:'ðŸ“Š',label:'Accueil',id:'dashboard'},{icon:'ðŸ“Š',label:'Tableau de bord',id:'tableau-de-bord'},{icon:'ðŸ“¦',label:'DÃ©pÃ´ts',id:'depots'},{icon:'ðŸ“‹',label:'MatÃ©riel',id:'materiel'},{icon:'ðŸ“ˆ',label:'Mouvements',id:'movements'},{icon:'ðŸ“…',label:'RÃ©servations',id:'reservations'},{icon:'ðŸ‘¥',label:'Gestion des utilisateurs',id:'users'}];const handleMenuClick=id=>{if(id==='dashboard'){navigate('/dashboard');}else if(id==='tableau-de-bord'){navigate('/tableau-de-bord');}else if(id==='depots'){navigate('/depots');}else if(id==='materiel'){navigate('/materiel');}else if(id==='movements'){navigate('/movements');}else if(id==='reservations'){navigate('/reservations');}else if(id==='users'){navigate('/user_management');}else{console.log("Navigate to: ".concat(id));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("aside",{className:"shared-sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-icon",children:"\uD83D\uDCE6"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"web"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Gestion de stock"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"sidebar-menu",children:menuItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"#",className:"menu-item ".concat(item.id===activePage?'active':''),onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();handleMenuClick(item.id);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"menu-icon",children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"menu-label",children:item.label})]},item.id))})]});};export default Sidebar;
